14 boost::shared_ptr<pcl::visualization::PCLVisualizer> PclFilters::visualize(pcl::PointCloud<pcl::PointXYZ>::Ptr cloud)
15 {

19  return (viewer);

22 boost::shared_ptr<pcl::visualization::PCLVisualizer> PclFilters::visualize_rgb(pcl::PointCloud<pcl::PointXYZRGB>::Ptr cloud)
23 {

26  viewer->addPointCloud<pcl::PointXYZRGB> (cloud, rgb, "sample cloud");

31 boost::shared_ptr<pcl::visualization::PCLVisualizer> PclFilters::visualize_normals(pcl::PointCloud<pcl::PointXYZ>::Ptr cloud, double radius, int numOfNormals)
32 {
33  viewer.reset(new pcl::visualization::PCLVisualizer ("3D Viewer",false));
34  viewer->addPointCloud<pcl::PointXYZ> (cloud, "sample cloud");
35  viewer->addPointCloudNormals<pcl::PointXYZ, pcl::Normal> (cloud, get_normals(cloud,radius), numOfNormals, 0.05, "normals");
36  viewer->setPointCloudRenderingProperties (pcl::visualization::PCL_VISUALIZER_COLOR, 1.0, 0.0, 0.0, "normals");
37  viewer->initCameraParameters ();
38  filteredCloud = cloud;
39  return (viewer);
40 }

42 std::vector<pcl::PointCloud<pcl::PointXYZ>::Ptr> PclFilters::cluster_extraction(pcl::PointCloud<pcl::PointXYZ>::Ptr cloud, double distance)
43 {
44  pcl::PointCloud<pcl::PointXYZ>::Ptr cloud_f (new pcl::PointCloud<pcl::PointXYZ>), outcloud(new pcl::PointCloud<pcl::PointXYZ>);
45  pcl::PointCloud<pcl::PointXYZ>::Ptr incloud (new pcl::PointCloud<pcl::PointXYZ>);
46  pcl::copyPointCloud(*cloud,*incloud);
47 
48  // Create the segmentation object for the planar model and set all the parameters
49  pcl::SACSegmentation<pcl::PointXYZ> seg;
50  pcl::PointIndices::Ptr inliers (new pcl::PointIndices);
51  pcl::ModelCoefficients::Ptr coefficients (new pcl::ModelCoefficients);
52  pcl::PointCloud<pcl::PointXYZ>::Ptr cloud_plane (new pcl::PointCloud<pcl::PointXYZ> ());
53  seg.setOptimizeCoefficients (true);
54  seg.setModelType (pcl::SACMODEL_PLANE);
55  seg.setMethodType (pcl::SAC_RANSAC);
56  seg.setMaxIterations (100);
57  seg.setDistanceThreshold (distance);
58 
59  int i=0, nr_points = (int) incloud->points.size ();
60  while (incloud->points.size () > 0.3 * nr_points)
61  {
62  // Segment the largest planar component from the remaining cloud
63  seg.setInputCloud (incloud);
64  seg.segment (*inliers, *coefficients);
65  if (inliers->indices.size () == 0)
66  {
67  std::cout << "Could not estimate a planar model for the given dataset." << std::endl;
68  break;
69  }
70 
71  // Extract the planar inliers from the input cloud
72  pcl::ExtractIndices<pcl::PointXYZ> extract;
73  extract.setInputCloud (incloud);
74  extract.setIndices (inliers);
75  extract.setNegative (false);
76 
77  // Get the points associated with the planar surface
78  extract.filter (*cloud_plane);
79 
80  // Remove the planar inliers, extract the rest
81  extract.setNegative (true);
82  extract.filter (*cloud_f);
83  *incloud = *cloud_f;
84  }
85 
86  // Creating the KdTree object for the search method of the extraction
87  pcl::search::KdTree<pcl::PointXYZ>::Ptr tree (new pcl::search::KdTree<pcl::PointXYZ>);
88  tree->setInputCloud (incloud);
89 
90  std::vector<pcl::PointIndices> cluster_indices;
91  pcl::EuclideanClusterExtraction<pcl::PointXYZ> ec;
92  ec.setClusterTolerance (0.02); // 2cm
93  ec.setMinClusterSize (100);
94  ec.setMaxClusterSize (25000);
95  ec.setSearchMethod (tree);
96  ec.setInputCloud (incloud);
97  ec.extract (cluster_indices);
98 
99  std::vector<pcl::PointCloud<pcl::PointXYZ>::Ptr> clusters;
100  for(int i = 0; i< cluster_indices.size(); i++){
101  pcl::PointCloud<pcl::PointXYZ>::Ptr tmpcloud (new pcl::PointCloud<pcl::PointXYZ>);
102  pcl::copyPointCloud(*incloud,cluster_indices[i],*tmpcloud);
103  clusters.push_back(tmpcloud);
104  }
105  filteredCloud = combine_clouds(clusters);
106  return (clusters);
107 }
108 
109 pcl::PointCloud<pcl::PointXYZ>::Ptr PclFilters::plane_segmentation(pcl::PointCloud<pcl::PointXYZ>::Ptr cloud, double distance)
110 {
111  pcl::PointCloud<pcl::PointXYZ>::Ptr incloud (new pcl::PointCloud<pcl::PointXYZ>);
112  pcl::PointCloud<pcl::PointXYZ>::Ptr cloud_plane (new pcl::PointCloud<pcl::PointXYZ>);
113  pcl::copyPointCloud(*cloud,*incloud);
114  pcl::ModelCoefficients::Ptr coefficients (new pcl::ModelCoefficients);
115  pcl::PointIndices::Ptr inliers (new pcl::PointIndices);
116  // Create the segmentation object
117  pcl::SACSegmentation<pcl::PointXYZ> seg;
118  // Optional
119  seg.setOptimizeCoefficients (true);
120  // Mandatory
121  seg.setModelType (pcl::SACMODEL_PLANE);
122  seg.setMethodType (pcl::SAC_RANSAC);
123  seg.setDistanceThreshold (distance);
124  seg.setInputCloud (cloud);
125  seg.segment (*inliers, *coefficients);
126 
127  pcl::ExtractIndices<pcl::PointXYZ> extract;
128  extract.setInputCloud (incloud);
129  extract.setIndices (inliers);
130  extract.setNegative (false);
131 
132  // Get the points associated with the planar surface
133  extract.filter (*cloud_plane);
134 
135  filteredCloud = cloud;
136  return (cloud_plane);
137 }
138 
139 pcl::PointCloud<pcl::PointXYZ>::Ptr PclFilters::get_filtered_cloud()
140 {
141  return filteredCloud;
142 }
143 
144 pcl::PointCloud<pcl::PointXYZRGB>::Ptr PclFilters::color_cloud(pcl::PointCloud<pcl::PointXYZ>::Ptr cloud, int r, int g, int b)
145 {
146  pcl::PointCloud<pcl::PointXYZRGB>::Ptr rgb_cloud(new pcl::PointCloud<pcl::PointXYZRGB>);
147  pcl::copyPointCloud(*cloud,*rgb_cloud);
148 
149  //color all points white
150  for (int i = 0; i< rgb_cloud->points.size(); i++)
151  {
152  rgb_cloud->points[i].r = r;
153  rgb_cloud->points[i].g = g;
154  rgb_cloud->points[i].b = b;
155  }
156  return (rgb_cloud);
157 }

159 pcl::PointCloud<pcl::Normal>::Ptr PclFilters::get_normals(pcl::PointCloud<pcl::PointXYZ>::Ptr cloud, double radius)
160 {
161  pcl::PointCloud<pcl::Normal>::Ptr normals_out (new pcl::PointCloud<pcl::Normal>);
162  pcl::search::KdTree<pcl::PointXYZ>::Ptr tree (new pcl::search::KdTree<pcl::PointXYZ> ());
163  pcl::NormalEstimationOMP<pcl::PointXYZ, pcl::Normal> norm_est;
164  norm_est.setSearchMethod(tree);
165  norm_est.setRadiusSearch (radius);
166  norm_est.setInputCloud (cloud);
167  //norm_est.setSearchSurface (cloud);
168  norm_est.compute (*normals_out);
169  return (normals_out);
170 }

172 pcl::PointCloud<pcl::PointXYZ>::Ptr PclFilters::passthrough_filter(pcl::PointCloud<pcl::PointXYZ>::Ptr cloud, double min, double max, std::string axis)
173 {
174  pcl::PointCloud<pcl::PointXYZ>::Ptr cloud_filtered (new pcl::PointCloud<pcl::PointXYZ>);
175  passfilter.setKeepOrganized(true);
176  passfilter.setInputCloud(cloud);
177  passfilter.setFilterFieldName(axis);
178  passfilter.setFilterLimits(min,max);
179  passfilter.filter(*cloud_filtered);
180  filteredCloud = cloud_filtered;
181  return (cloud_filtered);
182 }

184 pcl::PointCloud<pcl::PointXYZ>::Ptr PclFilters::voxel_grid_filter(pcl::PointCloud<pcl::PointXYZ>::Ptr cloud, double lx, double ly, double lz)
185 {
186  pcl::PointCloud<pcl::PointXYZ>::Ptr cloud_filtered (new pcl::PointCloud<pcl::PointXYZ>);
187  voxelfilter.setInputCloud(cloud);
188  voxelfilter.setLeafSize(lx,ly,lz);
189  voxelfilter.filter(*cloud_filtered);
190  filteredCloud = cloud_filtered;
191  return (cloud_filtered);
192 }

194 pcl::PointCloud<pcl::PointXYZ>::Ptr PclFilters::median_filter(pcl::PointCloud<pcl::PointXYZ>::Ptr cloud, int window_size, double max_allowed_movement)
195 {
196  pcl::PointCloud<pcl::PointXYZ>::Ptr cloud_filtered (new pcl::PointCloud<pcl::PointXYZ>);
197  medianfilter.setInputCloud(cloud);
198  medianfilter.setWindowSize(window_size);
199  medianfilter.setMaxAllowedMovement(max_allowed_movement);
200  medianfilter.filter(*cloud_filtered);
201  filteredCloud = cloud_filtered;
202  return (cloud_filtered);
203 }

205 pcl::PointCloud<pcl::PointXYZ>::Ptr PclFilters::shadowpoint_removal_filter(pcl::PointCloud<pcl::PointXYZ>::Ptr cloud, double threshold, double radius)
206 {
207  pcl::PointCloud<pcl::PointXYZ>::Ptr cloud_filtered (new pcl::PointCloud<pcl::PointXYZ>);
208  shadowpoint_filter.setInputCloud(cloud);
209  shadowpoint_filter.setKeepOrganized(true);
210  shadowpoint_filter.setThreshold(threshold);
211  shadowpoint_filter.setNormals(get_normals(cloud, radius));
212  shadowpoint_filter.filter(*cloud_filtered);
213  filteredCloud = cloud_filtered;
214  return (cloud_filtered);
215 }

217 pcl::PointCloud<pcl::PointXYZ>::Ptr PclFilters::statistical_outlier_filter(pcl::PointCloud<pcl::PointXYZ>::Ptr cloud, int meanK, double std_deviation_threshold)
218 {
219  pcl::PointCloud<pcl::PointXYZ>::Ptr cloud_filtered (new pcl::PointCloud<pcl::PointXYZ>);
220  statistical_outlier.setKeepOrganized(true);
221  statistical_outlier.setInputCloud(cloud);
222  statistical_outlier.setMeanK(meanK);
223  statistical_outlier.setStddevMulThresh(std_deviation_threshold);
224  statistical_outlier.filter(*cloud_filtered);
225  filteredCloud = cloud_filtered;
226  return (cloud_filtered);
227 }

229 pcl::PointCloud<pcl::PointXYZ>::Ptr PclFilters::combine_clouds(std::vector<pcl::PointCloud<pcl::PointXYZ>::Ptr> input)
230 {
231  pcl::PointCloud<pcl::PointXYZ>::Ptr cluster_cloud (new pcl::PointCloud<pcl::PointXYZ>);
232  *cluster_cloud = *input.at(0);
233  for (unsigned i=0; i<input.size(); i++){
234  *cluster_cloud += *(pcl::PointCloud<pcl::PointXYZ>::Ptr) input.at(i);
235  }
236  return (cluster_cloud);
237 
238 }
239 
240 pcl::PointCloud<pcl::VFHSignature308>::Ptr PclFilters::compute_cvfh_descriptors(pcl::PointCloud<pcl::PointXYZ>::Ptr cloud)
241 {
242  pcl::PointCloud<pcl::VFHSignature308>::Ptr descriptors(new pcl::PointCloud<pcl::VFHSignature308>);
243  pcl::search::KdTree<pcl::PointXYZ>::Ptr kdtree(new pcl::search::KdTree<pcl::PointXYZ>);
244  pcl::PointCloud<pcl::Normal>::Ptr normals = get_normals(cloud,0.01);
245  // CVFH estimation object.
246  pcl::CVFHEstimation<pcl::PointXYZ, pcl::Normal, pcl::VFHSignature308> cvfh;
247  cvfh.setInputCloud(cloud);
248  cvfh.setInputNormals(normals);
249  cvfh.setSearchMethod(kdtree);
250  // Set the maximum allowable deviation of the normals,
251  // for the region segmentation step.
252  cvfh.setEPSAngleThreshold(5.0 / 180.0 * M_PI); // 5 degrees.
253  // Set the curvature threshold (maximum disparity between curvatures),
254  // for the region segmentation step.
255  cvfh.setCurvatureThreshold(1.0);
256  // Set to true to normalize the bins of the resulting histogram,
257  // using the total number of points. Note: enabling it will make CVFH
258  // invariant to scale just like VFH, but the authors encourage the opposite.
259  cvfh.setNormalizeBins(false);
260  cvfh.compute(*descriptors);
261  return (descriptors);
262 }
263 
264 pcl::PointCloud<pcl::PointXYZ>::Ptr PclFilters::bilateral_filter(pcl::PointCloud<pcl::PointXYZ>::Ptr cloud, double sigmaS, double sigmaR)
265 {
266  pcl::PointCloud<pcl::PointXYZ>::Ptr cloud_filtered (new pcl::PointCloud<pcl::PointXYZ>);
267  pcl::FastBilateralFilterOMP<pcl::PointXYZ> bifilter;
268  bifilter.setInputCloud(cloud);
269  bifilter.setSigmaR(sigmaR);
270  bifilter.setSigmaS(sigmaS);
271  bifilter.filter(*cloud_filtered);
272  filteredCloud = cloud_filtered;
273  return (cloud_filtered);
274 }
275 
276 std::vector<RayTracedCloud_descriptors> PclFilters::get_descriptors(std::vector<RayTraceCloud> inclouds)
277 {
278  //ray_trace_loader->setCloudResolution(200);
279  std::vector<RayTracedCloud_descriptors> defined_clouds;
280 
281  for(int i = 0; i< inclouds.size(); i++){
282  RayTracedCloud_descriptors tmp;
283  RayTraceCloud current = inclouds.at(i);
284  tmp.cloud = current.cloud;
285  tmp.enthropy = current.enthropy;
286  tmp.pose = current.pose;
287  tmp.descriptor = compute_cvfh_descriptors(tmp.cloud);
288  defined_clouds.push_back(tmp);
289  }
290  return (defined_clouds);
291 }
292 
293 pcl::PointCloud<pcl::ESFSignature640>::Ptr PclFilters::compute_esf_descriptors(pcl::PointCloud<pcl::PointXYZ>::Ptr cloud){
294  pcl::PointCloud<pcl::ESFSignature640>::Ptr descriptor(new pcl::PointCloud<pcl::ESFSignature640>);
295  pcl::ESFEstimation<pcl::PointXYZ, pcl::ESFSignature640> esf;
296  esf.setInputCloud(cloud);
297  esf.compute(*descriptor);
298  return (descriptor);
299 }
300 
301 pcl::PointCloud<pcl::VFHSignature308>::Ptr PclFilters::compute_ourcvfh_descriptors(pcl::PointCloud<pcl::PointXYZ>::Ptr cloud){
302  pcl::PointCloud<pcl::VFHSignature308>::Ptr descriptors(new pcl::PointCloud<pcl::VFHSignature308>);
303  pcl::search::KdTree<pcl::PointXYZ>::Ptr kdtree(new pcl::search::KdTree<pcl::PointXYZ>);
304  pcl::OURCVFHEstimation<pcl::PointXYZ, pcl::Normal, pcl::VFHSignature308> ourcvfh;
305 
306  ourcvfh.setInputCloud(cloud);
307  ourcvfh.setInputNormals(get_normals(cloud,0.03));
308  ourcvfh.setSearchMethod(kdtree);
309  ourcvfh.setEPSAngleThreshold(5.0 / 180.0 * M_PI); // 5 degrees.
310  ourcvfh.setCurvatureThreshold(1.0);
311  ourcvfh.setNormalizeBins(false);
312  // Set the minimum axis ratio between the SGURF axes. At the disambiguation phase,
313  // this will decide if additional Reference Frames need to be created, if ambiguous.
314  ourcvfh.setAxisRatio(0.8);
315  ourcvfh.compute(*descriptors);
316  return (descriptors);
317 }
318 
319 pcl::PointCloud<pcl::GFPFHSignature16>::Ptr PclFilters::compute_gfpfh_descriptors(pcl::PointCloud<pcl::PointXYZ>::Ptr cloud){
320  pcl::PointCloud<pcl::PointXYZL>::Ptr object(new pcl::PointCloud<pcl::PointXYZL>);
321  pcl::PointCloud<pcl::GFPFHSignature16>::Ptr descriptor(new pcl::PointCloud<pcl::GFPFHSignature16>);
322 
323  pcl::copyPointCloud(*cloud,*object);
324 
325  // Note: you should now perform classification on the cloud's points. See the
326  // original paper for more details. For this example, we will now consider 4
327  // different classes, and randomly label each point as one of them.
328  for (size_t i = 0; i < object->points.size(); ++i)
329  {
330  object->points[i].label = 1 + i % 4;
331  }
332 
333  pcl::GFPFHEstimation<pcl::PointXYZL, pcl::PointXYZL, pcl::GFPFHSignature16> gfpfh;
334  gfpfh.setInputCloud(object);
335  gfpfh.setInputLabels(object);
336  gfpfh.setOctreeLeafSize(0.01);
337  gfpfh.setNumberOfClasses(4);
338  gfpfh.compute(*descriptor);
339 
340  return (descriptor);
341 }
342 
343 }
